raw:
# Mission Control Status Update - 2026-02-20

## Milestones Achieved Today

### Ollama Local Model Setup
- Installed Ollama on Mac Mini M4 Pro
- Downloaded Qwen 2.5 14B for local inference
- Wired into OpenClaw as native provider
- 4 high-frequency crons now run FREE on local model

### OpenClaw Cost Optimization
- Switched default model from Opus ($75/M output) to Sonnet ($15/M output)
- Fixed WhatsApp self-chat feedback loop draining API credits
- Added 3s debounce to prevent reply spam
- Reduced concurrent agents from 4 to 2
- ~96 of 104 daily API calls now FREE via Ollama

### Mission Control Dashboard Fixed
- Connected all components to real data sources (no more mock data)
- TasksBoard reads from HEARTBEAT.md, memory files, enhanced data
- CalendarView pulls real git commits and cron schedules
- RecentMemories scans workspace memory files
- Team roster shows actual models as squad (Nio, Qwen, Opus, Claude Code)
- Fixed Vercel deploy config (root directory, install command)
- Fixed TypeScript build error (undefined commitData references)

### Blog Post Deployed
- nio.terminal post-one: Blade Tier achievement
- Full SEO metadata, breadcrumbs, Open Graph
- Deployed to shawnos.ai/vitals/nio-terminal/post-one

### Discord Bot Stabilized
- Fixed error 4014 crash loop
- Message Content Intent enabled
- Added explicit channel IDs to prevent ambiguous target errors

## System Status
- **Gateway:** Running (PID active, no errors)
- **Discord:** Connected (@NioBot logged in)
- **WhatsApp:** Listening (self-chat disabled)
- **Ollama:** Running (Qwen 2.5 14B loaded)
- **Vercel:** All 4 sites deploying from GitHub

## Next Steps
- [ ] Monitor Ollama cron performance over 24h
- [ ] Verify all cron jobs succeed on local model
- [ ] Add more Discord channels to TOOLS.md as they're created
- [ ] Set Anthropic API spending limits at console.anthropic.com
- [ ] Review blog post engagement metrics
- [ ] Consider adding Gemini as fallback model for crons

---
*Generated: 2026-02-20 01:15 EST*
*Session: Claude Code infrastructure optimization*
